law.catch_line: Licensing of business entities as agents.

text.section: Within thirty (30) days of the change, the licensee shall notify the commissioner of all changes among its members, directors, officers, and other individuals designated in or registered as to the license.
Each agent authorized to act for the business entity shall be designated with the commissioner as to the license in accordance with KRS 304.9-133.

The commissioner may require additional information or submissions from applicants and may obtain any documents or information reasonably necessary to verify the information contained in an application.
